doc.title: The KNTV Show
doc.plot: Mama: K and N leave home and move into the studio when Mama Nietzsche cleans their room. Svetlanas: the boys lose their girl friends but when them back by using a laser. Skool: when their cooking exam goes horribly wrong, the boys do a resit with unusual results. Drive: The boy inherit a car from an uncle, but neither can drive. K must sit his driving exam and they boys have built in some special features to the car. Musik: To win a record contract, the boys re-invent their band with the help of a robot. Addiktion: N gets hooked on potato hooch and K must same him with a family intervention.
